text:
="preserve">Giuseppe Matarrese (3 June 1934 – 27 June 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1959. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Suburbicarian Diocese of Frascati, Italy, from 1989 to 2009.
Matarrese died on 27 June 2020, aged 86.

annotations.surface_form: Roman Catholic Suburbicarian Diocese of Frascati
